aboutUs.title: Who Are We?
aboutUs.paragraph1: We are a specialized financial consulting company providing professional financial consulting for Egyptian businesses and GCC countries. Our services are designed by financial experts, ensuring reliable outsourced accounting and financial services, helping clients develop enhanced business strategies.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our unique approach goes beyond traditional business, offering a comprehensive range of services to meet all client needs. Through collaboration and innovation, we aim to drive growth and excellence. Our key business units include: Consulting, Legal and Tax, Audit and Accounting, ERP Implementation, Digital Transformation, and Strategy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to become a leading professional consulting firm in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and the Middle East, providing high-level financial and business services aligned with our values and highest quality standards to meet our clients' needs and ensure long-term success for local and foreign businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to help organizations move their mission and strategy forward. We simplify your operations while improving the service experience for all stakeholders and enhancing the sustainability of our strategic relationships and providing value-added services to our clients.

ceo.name: Mr. Sameh Said Abdel Fattah
ceo.paragraph1: 3Capital  has established a trusted reputation known for providing customized solutions for diverse business needs. Our services target both local and foreign businesses looking to invest in the Egyptian and Saudi markets, where we provide a mix of business expertise, extensive experience, local insights, networking capabilities, and strategic guidance to ensure our clients' success in their endeavors.
ceo.paragraph2: We work to accelerate business development in emerging markets, and reduce investment risks by leveraging promising opportunities that align with Vision 2030 initiatives.

faqSection.heading: We're always here to answer any questions you may have

faqItems.question: What financial consulting services do you offer?
faqItems.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of financial consulting services including personal financial planning, investment management, tax planning, and retirement planning.

faqItems.question: How can I determine my financial consulting needs?
faqItems.answer: We conduct a comprehensive analysis of your current financial situation, future goals, and risk tolerance to determine the best services for you.

faqItems.question: What is the duration of a financial consultation session?
faqItems.answer: The consultation session lasts between 60-90 minutes, and follow-up sessions may be required depending on the complexity of the case.

faqItems.question: Do you offer financial consulting for small businesses?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer specialized consulting services for small businesses including financial planning, cash flow management, and performance improvement.

faqItems.question: What is the cost of financial consulting services?
faqItems.answer: The cost varies depending on the type of service and the complexity of the case. We offer flexible pricing plans to suit different budgets.

faqItems.question: Do you offer remote financial consultations?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer online financial consultations through secure and convenient virtual sessions for clients.

faqItems.question: What are the qualifications of your financial consultants?
faqItems.answer: Our consultants hold accredited certifications and have extensive experience in the financial field, committed to high ethical and professional standards.

faqItems.question: How can I start getting financial consultation?
faqItems.answer: You can contact us via phone or email to schedule a free initial appointment to discuss your financial needs.
